titleStmt.title: A true and historical relation of the poysoning of Sir Thomas Overbury with the severall arraignments and speeches of those that were executed thereupon : also, all the passages concerning the divorce between Robert, late Earle of Essex, and the Lady Frances Howard : with King James's and other large speeches / collected out of the papers of Sir Francis Bacon ...
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.M. & A.C. for John Benson and John Playford ...,

notesStmt.note: Item at 80:7 identified as B338 (entry cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
